short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab page that shows list of things you could be doing instead of wasting your time on the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the default new tab page in chrome with an editable list. The idea is that if you're opening a new tab because you're bored, you'll see a list of things you could be doing instead of wasting your time on the internet.
